creator: Alexander Terp
title: RAD-117: Import functions from other scripts (SEO: std lib, stdlib)
description:
prerequisite: RAD-116

be able to import functions defined from other scripts, for example:

```
import * from otherscript.rsl
```

^ perhaps can elide `.rsl`?

```
import cut, run from otherscript
```

Assess syntax, and ordering e.g. write script first then the things you import?

consider some Go-like Init mechanism? Could allow files to e.g. memoize? Files can almost become a sort of 'class'? Potentially powerful.

Having custom functions and imports would also allow for some stdlib equivalent and namespacing, i.e. defining official library functions in a stdlib
